The highest level of developed emotional intelligence is wisdom where emotional intelligence is a characteristic of the brain. The actual physical quality of the brain determines the emotional intelligence quality of the brain. Though there are many levels of this quality of emotional intelligence we can quantify them in broadly four levels as follows:
  +   +
1) Premature physical quality of the brain (the brain at birth) = premature emotional intelligence (ignorance) quantified with a value of negative 2 (-2).
  +
2) Immature physical quality of the brain (the brain of a teenager) = immature emotional intelligence ( part ignorance some wisdom) quantified with value of negative 1 (-1).
  +
3) Mature physical quality of the brain ( the brain of an adult) = mature emotional intelligence (wisdom but still partly cloaked in ignorance) quantified with a value of positive 1 (+1).
  +
4) Super mature physical quality of the brain (the brain of a self master) = super mature emotional intelligence (wisdom) quantified with a value of positive 2 (+2).
  +   +
It is the emotional baggage in the brain that determines the physical quality of the brain which determines the level of emotional intelligence. Thus wisdom education means learning to take out the emotional baggage from the brain. When the brain is squeaky clean emotionally it sprouts wisdom automatically. To have wisdom means to have a super mature emotionally intelligent brain. Also wisdom = +2 emotional intelligence = self mastery. All three are the one and same entity! To be super emotionally intelligent means to be wise and to be wise means to be a self master. So to become wise develop your emotional intelligence to the super mature +2 brain level.
